attributes.action: Will we have a future in this country the young the old ,will we have jobs houses pensions ,heat light ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Will we have a future in this country the young the old ,will we have jobs houses pensions ,heat light ?
 
we ordinary people earning small amounts of money current working class I am a manager on small money less than £20,000 per year 
 
cant afford to live 
 
What hope have we got 
 
Please help save this green and pleasant land 
 
for the sake of my children and grandchildren 
 
M Jones

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
